ygData.subject: Re: Got to 34
ygData.msgSnippet: i know i used to, and i was often pleasantly surprised.  i say used to because i just got back into it =)  damn, many of my friends are L50 already, or pretty
ygData.messageBody:
i know i used to, and i was often pleasantly surprised. i say used to
because i just got back into it =) damn, many of my friends are L50
already, or pretty close. stupid rl!

on a side note, last night i was helping kill findlegrob (sp?) in rathe
mtns, and recieved some weird numeric faction hit. is this important, or is
it basically just findlegrob faction?

Belphenor


>From: "James Harless" <jharless@...>
>Reply-To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
>To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
>Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Got to 34
>Date: Thu, 23 Dec 1999 13:55:03 -0600
>
>I think you are seriously over estimating the threat level of Spectres. It
>is very easy to get our dots stuck to them. You would have a problem using
>a dd at 32nd level, but, you won't have too much trouble with blood boil,
>engulfing darkness, vamp curse, repeat. Doesn't everyone else go around
>trying to see what red mob they can still kill? :)
>
>James
>
> > From: Dave Karpman <davek@...>
> >
> > The specs can go as high as lvl. 37, so I can only guess that the
>feerott
> > specs were not as high a level when you were soloing them.
> >
> > Otherwise, I can't imagine how you could get any spells to stick on a
>mob
>5
> > levels above yourself.
> >
>
>
>

>This list is basically unmoderated. However abusive language will not be
>tolerated
